data.name: Fishing Paradiso OST
data.detailed_description: Enjoy the full soundtrack to Fishing Paradiso, courtesy of Xion. Includes all of the songs from the game in crystal-clear high definition. It’s music that’s tailor-made to make usually mundane, methodical tasks like fishing feel relaxing and therapeutic, so it never gets old. Throw it on anytime you need a little taste of paradise.
data.about_the_game: Enjoy the full soundtrack to Fishing Paradiso, courtesy of Xion. Includes all of the songs from the game in crystal-clear high definition. It’s music that’s tailor-made to make usually mundane, methodical tasks like fishing feel relaxing and therapeutic, so it never gets old. Throw it on anytime you need a little taste of paradise.
data.short_description: Kick back and let the relaxing sounds of paradise soothe your soul. Perfect background music to work or chillax to.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
  • Storage (high-quality audio): Additional 1300 MB available space
